channel.title: Play Testing
channel.description: Need some feedback on your latest map before its final release? Here's the place!

item.title: DM-backup (ut99)

download it here https://www.dropbox.com/s/vqauw0x0rqvkyk7/DM-Backup.zip

cya

item.content:encoded:
http://files.filefront.com/DM+Doomzip/;12709300;/fileinfo.html

item.title: iCTF 2 on 2 map needs testing
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hushfield)
item.dc:creator: Hushfield
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,

This is my first map for ut2004, and I decided to start small. I made a 2 on 2 iCTF map. The map is nothing special, these are the goals i set for myself in making it.
- It has to be a 2 on 2 iCTF map.
- It has to be open enough so that a player can be shot from a number of points on the map, making for some last second saves and giving people with better aim a significant edge on their opponents.

I am looking for all kinds of criticism: lights, textures, static mesh...

iCTF 2 on 2 map needs testing

item.title: Critiques for Gears SP levels (Youtubes included)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Thaur)
item.dc:creator: Thaur
item.content:encoded:
The community for Gears of War PC is very small and I am in need of more feedback. I have provided Youtube playthroughs for the 3 main maps I want feedback on, but if you are interested please try the others too. Higher quality full length versions are also available to download through filefront. (Cuts were made to fit inside Youtube's 10 minute limit). Thank you for your time!

Youtube links:

Descent: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ajohh8gjJzA

The Knell: (Older...

Critiques for Gears SP levels (Youtubes included)

item.content:encoded:
I am almost done with one classic: CTF-November from UT99.

So I need some constructive feedback, I do not want to release this map unpolished. And official Epic forum kind of fails, all they write is: "oh too dark" "oh cool" etc.





...

CTF-October - PIC,DL - no bot support or items yet.

item.title: DM-Gaia][ An Urban Map For Ut2k4?¿?¿
item.author: invalid@example.com (GRëd (V)èg@1224)
item.dc:creator: GRëd (V)èg@1224
item.content:encoded: I'll be done with this one in the next 2 or 3 days so i'm hoping to get a few beta testers before that happens, the zip will be password protected so anyone interested in helping me out please raise your hand!. otherwise i'll end up not releasing anything at all.

item.title: I need to help to complete my map.
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrFawn)
item.dc:creator: MrFawn
item.content:encoded:
I've not made a UT2004 map yet, it's a shame. The truth is that I just dont find it much motivating and I'm busy at my university doing something completely different.

So I have an almost half finished UT2004 map that hopefully one day would be finished. But for that I need someone else that is willing to work their ass off to finish it.
Are you willing to help me to finish this map you can either send me a pm or just reply.
Here is a screenshot of what I've done so far....

I need to help to complete my map.

item.title: DM-Mess v1.0
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eyuva 'S' NRG)
item.dc:creator: Eyuva 'S' NRG
item.content:encoded:
New map, soon to be on the Nali City list.

I need some extensive bot testing on this one. However, because of the nature of the map, the bots kind of leap into the slime from the lifts, which I could correct... IF I knew of any maps that used lifts that go horizontally instead of vertically as an example.

Try it out and let me know what can be done with the bot pathing on those lifts.

The map should be posted sometime soon.

item.title: ctf-inner-sanctum-progress-beta-download
item.author: invalid@example.com (BIG-MICK)
item.dc:creator: BIG-MICK
item.content:encoded:
I have tried to do something fresh with the tired old egyptian theme...Have given the map a modernist look with a flavour of old style egypt ...And I think it works quite well..so far..Hope you do too.

Things completed or partially completed in this beta..
Layout............................. 100%
Texture Placement............. 100%
Deco additions.................100%
Trim........................... 95%
Working movers................. 80% At present monorail movers work by actor...

ctf-inner-sanctum-progress-beta-download

item.title: Please test this beta out for me
item.author: invalid@example.com (BIG-MICK)
item.dc:creator: BIG-MICK
item.content:encoded:
Nearing final layout..need feedback on any problems with flow..before I go on to next stage...there are a few bugs in this version...have added a lot of movers...and a few of which have disappeared from the editor but not the map ie..3 small lifts that are in the wrong start position and two test doors that look naff and are timed to open a fraction too slow..needless to say I cannot remove them ..or fix them at present because they do not show in ed....if you have any ideas about how to fix...

Please test this beta out for me

item.title: 1on1 The Dogs of War beta 1
item.author: invalid@example.com (Esque)
item.dc:creator: Esque
item.content:encoded:
Gulp...first map.
A big-on-flow 1 vs 1 map. Tight and fast. I tried to be interesting with the visuals, with a mixture of hot and cold lighting, but I'm still getting the hang of fitting meshes together in interesting ways...
I think it'll seem quite rough around the edges, so I need some more experienced dudes to give me a few pointers...

More information, some more (and bigger) screenshots and a download

Some quick...

1on1 The Dogs of War beta 1
